snippet: The New York Philharmonic has established a four-year partnership with the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra that will include a residency in China and a stake in an orchestra training program.
abstract: New York Philharmonic establishes four-year partnership with Shanghai Symphony Orchestra that will include residency in China and stake in orchestra training program;  joins Philadelphia Orchestra in seeking to bring large-scale projects to China in order to tap into country's growing interest in classical music.
lead_paragraph: The New York Philharmonic has established a four-year partnership with the Shanghai Symphony Orchestra that will include a residency in China and a stake in an orchestra training program.

headline.seo: New York Philharmonic and Shanghai Symphony Become Partners
